spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent replication of the complex wall perimeters and bay windows. Door orientations generally match. Minor deduction for the scaling of the central pantry island which appears slightly wider than the blueprint, and the playroom window layout is simplified compared to the multi-pane blueprint spec.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed, all rooms are present, and there are no hallucinated structural extensions. The model is perfectly isolated on a dark neutral background with no text or measurement artifacts.

furniture_mapping.notes: High fidelity mapping of fixtures including the dual kitchen sinks, stove, and bathroom vanity. The 'Playroom' uses blocks to represent toys which is a clever interpretation of the room's function, though the sofa placement in the living room is additive (not explicitly on the plan).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly aesthetic with flat shading and no textures. The lighting is soft and ambient as requested. The camera is isometric, though slightly closer to a perspective-heavy isometric than a pure parallel orthographic.

detected_errors.description: Central pantry/island dimensions are slightly distorted/wider relative to the circulation paths shown in the floor plan.
Hallucinated sofa in the living room and decorative blocks in the playroom not present in the original technical drawing.
